episode.title: Half of the Bikini Emoji
episode.rawTitle: 303: ‘Half of the Bikini Emoji’, With Matthew Panzarino
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Matthew Panzarino joins the show to talk about Apple's new AirPods Max headphones and the future of the Mac on Apple Silicon.
episode.showNotes:
Matthew Panzarino joins the show to talk about Apple's new AirPods Max headphones and the future of the Mac on Apple Silicon.

Sponsored by:

  • Honest Security: A free guide from Kolide, with everything they’ve learned over the last year working on their own product.
  • Away: Gift someone something to look forward to this holiday season.
  • Mack Weldon: Reinventing men’s basics with smart design, premium fabrics, and simple shopping. Get 20% off your first order with code talkshow.

Links:

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
